Ensure 'cat /etc/passwd | awk -F: '{ print $1 " " $3 " " $6 }' | while read user uid dir; do if [ $uid -ge 500 -a -d "$dir" -a $user != "nfsnobody" ]; then owner=$(stat -L -c "%U" "$dir"); if [ "$owner" != "$user" ]; then echo "The home directory ($dir) o
shellcommand_object.command: cat /etc/passwd | awk -F: '{ print $1 " " $3 " " $6 }' | while read user uid dir; do if [ $uid -ge 500 -a -d "$dir" -a $user != "nfsnobody" ]; then owner=$(stat -L -c "%U" "$dir"); if [ "$owner" != "$user" ]; then echo "The home directory ($dir) of user $user is owned by $owner."; fi; fi; done
